author: Agencia AFP
title: EEUU sanciona a "El Mochomito", un capo del cártel mexicano de los Beltrán Leyva
text:
EEUU sanciona a "El Mochomito", un capo del cártel mexicano de los Beltrán Leyva
Estados Unidos sancionó a Jesús Alfredo Beltrán Guzmán, alias "El Mochomito", un líder del cártel mexicano de los Beltrán Leyva, acusado de tráfico de fentanilo, cocaína, heroína y metanfetamina, informó este miércoles el Departamento del Tesoro.
La Organización Beltrán Leyva está implicada en "tiroteos, asesinatos, secuestros, torturas y cobros violentos de deudas de drogas", denuncia Washington.
La Oficina de Control de Activos Extranjeros (OFAC), dependiente del Departamento del Tesoro, impone sanciones a "El Mochomito" para bloquear todos sus bienes en Estados Unidos o los que estén en poder o bajo el control de estadounidenses.
Beltrán Guzmán y su organización actúan "con impunidad violenta, traficando con drogas mortales, amenazando a las comunidades y atacando a funcionarios clave", denunció el secretario del Tesoro, Scott Bessent, citado en un comunicado.
"El Mochomito" es el hijo mayor de Alfredo Beltrán Leyva, el exlíder de la organización que cumple cadena perpetua en una prisión estadounidense. También es sobrino de Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán, el exlíder del cártel de Sinaloa encarcelado en Estados Unidos.
El líder actual de los Beltrán Leyva es Fausto Isidro Meza Flores, conocido como el Chapo Isidro.
En 2016, las fuerzas de seguridad mexicanas detuvieron a "El Mochomito" por posesión de cocaína y de armas.
"Mientras estaba en prisión, Beltrán Guzmán fue acusado de torturar y extorsionar a los prisioneros, así como de continuar con sus operaciones de tráfico de drogas", asegura Washington.
Antes y desde su liberación de prisión en 2021, "ha estado involucrado en el tráfico de cocaína, heroína, metanfetamina y fentanilo", añade.
Le acusa de operar principalmente en un área conocida como el Triángulo Dorado, que incluye los estados mexicanos de Sinaloa (este), Chihuahua (norte) y Durango (centro).
Además del narcotráfico, se cree que Beltrán Guzmán es responsable del asesinato del agente Halexy Guadalupe el 18 de diciembre de 2024.
erl/dga

author: Poster
title: Responsible For The Bet Casino Live Budget? 10 Terrible Ways To Spend Your Money
text:
Bet Casino Live - How to Establish a Budget and Play Within Responsible Limits
Bet casino live offers a live gaming experience that is based on real-time dealers. These dealers are filmed with powerful cameras, allowing players to bet and enjoy the excitement of the game. However, it is important to establish a budget and play within reasonable limits.
All three games are available at Bet Casino Live: Blackjack, Roulette and Baccarat. Each of these games has its own variants and bet levels.
Live dealer gaming in real-time
Live casino games provide a more authentic gaming experience as they allow players to interact with live dealers in real-time. These games are streamed by studios located in secure locations which means that players can play them on phones or tablets without having to worry about security concerns. The games also come with an inbuilt feature that allows players to chat with the dealer and other players. This is a fun way to make the game more exciting and make players more engaged.
Live casinos stream the action using HD cameras. These cameras are situated in a studio, which is monitored by a team of experts. They can recognize your bets and react in a manner that is appropriate. The video feed is backed by RFID sensors, meaning that the casino can track your actions at the table and then compare them to the outcomes of every round. If the results are in line, the system will make a payment to your account.
Blackjack and roulette are two of the most played live casino games. Each game has its own rules and odds. For instance blackjack players can choose to place bets either inside or outside. Inside bets are placed on specific numbers and provide higher winning odds, while outside bets are placed on groups of numbers that are horizontally or vertically.
The best online live casino sites offer a wide range of games. This means they are able to cater to players of all levels and preferences. It is crucial to choose the appropriate games for your playing style and your bankroll. Selecting the right games will significantly increase your odds of winning and maximize enjoyment.
In addition to traditional casino games bet casino live offers a variety of lottery-style and sports betting games. These games are backed by a highly experienced team of customer support representatives who are ready to help you with any problem. Bet casino live also offers a variety of promotions and bonuses that can boost your bankroll.
Rain Bet of games at a live casino is a major factor in determining the reputation of the casino. Some of the top sites utilize top software providers like Evolution Gaming, Ezugi and Pragmatic Play. These companies are known for their commitment to quality and innovation. In fact, some of them have won the Live Casino Supplier of the Year award for 10 years in a row!
Choosing the right games
When playing at a bet casino live, you should always make sure you choose the games that fit your style and preferences. This will allow you to increase your enjoyment as well as increase the chance of making money. It is crucial to know your level of proficiency and your risk-taking capacity as they will influence your decision on which games to play. There are many types of games to pick from which include electronic games, table games and lottery-style ones. Each game type offers a unique experience and winning requires a distinct strategy. Make sure you search for a secure and secure withdrawal and deposit method, and review the terms and conditions carefully. Find out if there's a 24-hour customer service to answer your questions and concerns.
How to manage your money
If you're playing poker, blackjack or roulette, ensuring you manage your bankroll is vital to success in the casino. The best method to do this is to establish a gambling budget that's separate from your regular savings and income and will aid you in avoiding making poor decisions. You can also employ strategies such as setting limit for loss and win to keep track of your losses and wins.
You can control your bankroll by dividing the amount you want to spend each hour by the amount of rounds you can play before autoplay stops. This will give you a good idea of how fast your money is running and whether it's time to stop. Alternatively, you can play manually and adjust your bet size to maximize your money.
Another important aspect of managing your finances is ensuring that you are in control of your emotions. It's tempting to chase your losses and attempt to win back the money you've lost, however this is a recipe for disaster. Gambling is a game of chance and losing is inevitable.
You should also take breaks, particularly if you're losing. This will allow you to relax and let your logic take over and is an ideal choice instead of having your emotions guide you into making bets that are risky. Moreover, you should play slowly to cut down on the amount you're spending every hour.
Be aware that the house edge plays an important role in any casino game. Even even if your strategy is sound and you have a solid betting plan, you may still lose some of the wagers you make. Instead of trying to recover your losses, it's best to accept them as a normal part of gambling and follow your bankroll management gambling plan. author: @beliefnet
title: What Does a Rainbow Really Mean in the Bible? - Beliefnet
text: People typically associate rainbows with [hope](https://www.beliefnet.com/wellness/health/increase-hope.aspx), and for a good reason. They are a symbol of hope in many cultures. Rainbows show up during rainstorms when the sun shines onto water droplets. This shatters its white light into a display of brilliant colors. For many Christians, the rainbow is a sign that there are better days to come. To understand the true meaning of rainbows to Christians, we should turn to the Bible. Scripture first mentions rainbows in the book of Genesis at the end of the story about the flood story. The Bible says, “And God said, ‘This is the sign of the covenant that I make between me and you and every living creature that is with you, for all future generations: I have set my bow in the cloud, and it shall be a sign of the covenant between me and the earth” (Genesis 9:12-13). As a result of the constant evil and wickedness of mankind, God decided to cause rain to fall for 40 days and 40 nights to flood the entire earth. When several months of interesting events had taken place, God’s judgment calmed, and the rain stopped. This is when the rainbow first appeared in the sky. When the floodwaters receded, and Noah was able to get out of the boat onto dry land, he created an altar and offered a burnt offering to God. God replied with a declaration, a promise the Noah and his family. Genesis 14-16 says, “Whenever I bring clouds over the earth, and the rainbow appears in the clouds, I will remember my covenant between me and you and all living creatures of every kind. Never again will the waters become a flood to destroy all life. Whenever the rainbow appears in the clouds, I will see it and remember the everlasting covenant between God and all living creatures of every kind on the earth.” From this passage, we see that God gave special meaning to the rainbow, so whenever we do see it, we are reminded of God’s covenant – to never destroy the earth again with a flood. Ultimately, one of the most important takeaways from this story and the rainbow symbol is that it shows us God's grace and the purpose of redemption. God spared not only Noah but also his family. He gives us, humanity, the same opportunity to begin again. In addition to God putting a rainbow in the clouds after the flood, there are two other places where rainbows are mentioned in Scripture. This is in the book of Ezekiel and Revelation. When Ezekiel began to see visions of God, he said, “Like the appearance of a rainbow in a cloud on a rainy day, so was the appearance of the brightness all around it. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the Lord” (Ezekiel 1:28). There is also the reference in the book of Revelation. When John was on the island of Patmos, he saw a rainbow around the throne, in appearance like an emerald (Revelation 4:3). He later saw a vision of “an angel coming down from heaven, clothed with a cloud. And a rainbow was on his head, his face was like the sun, and his feet like pillars of fire” (Revelation 10:1). From these two passages, the rainbow is seen as a symbol of Christ. John sees Christ clothed with a cloud and a rainbow on His head. We also see the rainbow as a true sign of hope in the face of judgment. The rainbow in Noah's days symbolized how God’s glory could penetrate the clouds of judgment. We ultimately see that when tragedy occurs in our lives, we can have full confidence that God will restore us. God’s biblical promises are real, and His grace can truly conquer sin. Through Jesus’ redemption, He was crowned with the sign of the covenant of grace. The rainbow is a reminder of God’s constant presence in our lives. We know that God can destroy the earth, but we also know that He can start things anew. Yes, the rainbow is symbolic of hope, but it also a sign of God’s complete authority in our lives. There is hope in our obedience to God. Now, when you see a rainbow in the sky, you won’t just think of it as a symbol of “good luck” and make a wish. The truth is God judges sin. We see this through the story of a global flood in the days of Noah. Yet, we also see that God is merciful, making a covenant of grace. When we look at the rainbow as a symbol of Christ, we see that those who receive Him also receive the gift of salvation and grace. You can see it as a sign of hope for all future generations, as God intended it to be. Let that rainbow remind you of God’s inexpressible beauty and His covenant-keeping nature.

author: Priscilla Del Ninno
title: Batteri Killer, una pandemia silente. Schillaci: no “fai da te” e disinformazione. Governo in prima linea con fondi, ricerca, corsi
text:
Batteri killer e antibiotico-resistenza , il ministro Schillaci non fa sconti sulla situazione, e ospite a Unomattina su Raiuno afferma senza giri di parole: «L’Italia ha un Servizio Sanitario Nazionale che tutti gli altri Paesi ci invidiano, però purtroppo siamo agli ultimi posti in Europa per quanto riguarda la lotta all’antibiotico-resistenza. È importante ricordare che gli antibiotici vanno presi quando è necessario sempre sotto una stretta guida medica, non bisogna assolutamente usare il fai-da-te in questo campo così delicato perché gli antibiotici usati in maniera non adeguata causano una resistenza e quindi alcune malattie che possono essere curate, come la polmonite, magari diventano più difficili da affrontare ».
Batteri killer e antibiotico resistenza, Schillaci: dal governo 21 milioni di euro nella legge di bilancio per la ricerca Di più: secondo l’Oms nel 2050 l’antibiotico-resistenza potrebbe provocare oltre 39 milioni di morti al mondo . Pertanto, ha proseguito il ministro, «dobbiamo scongiurare assolutamente questo pericolo». E il governo è più che pronto e si è attrezzato a dovere: «Ci stiamo impegnando – ha ribadito Schillaci ancora oggi –. Sono stati messi 21 milioni di euro nella legge di bilancio per favorire la ricerca di nuovi antibiotici che siano in grado di sconfiggere batteri che sono diventati resistenti ai tradizionali antibiotici . Però ci vuole l’impegno di tutti: è una battaglia da fare insieme », ha sottolineato il ministro.
Antibiotico-resistenza, al via corsi di formazione specifici per medici di famiglia e ospedali E ancora. «I dati che abbiamo in nostro possesso testimoniano come spesso proprio nelle età più fragili – le persone più anziane. Oppure i pazienti in età pediatrica – c’è un uso eccessivo di antibiotici: per questo, stiamo partendo con dei corsi di formazione specifici, rivolti in particolare ai medici di famiglia» , che «hanno il più stretto rapporto con i cittadini: tocca a loro essere la guida per un uso responsabile degli antibiotici in tutte le fasce di età . La cosa migliore è sempre rivolgersi al medico, bisogna evitare le auto-prescrizioni e l’auto-somministrazione ».
Batteri killer, attenzione ai fragili tra gli anziani, soggetti con patologie gravi e pazienti in età pediatrica Non solo. Negli ospedali – ha sottolineato Schillaci – «bisogna avere particolare attenzione, soprattutto per i pazienti fragili, i più anziani o quelli che hanno delle patologie gravi. Proprio a loro bisogna somministrare gli antibiotici quando è necessario». Per il ministro «è un aspetto non solo che riguarda la salute , ma anche economico, perché ovviamente si dilatano i tempi di presenza delle persone all’interno degli ospedali: dobbiamo evitarlo, anche perché i soldi che si possono risparmiare da una battaglia come quella che stiamo conducendo insieme possono essere utilizzati, per esempio, per dare accesso ai pazienti alle nuove terapie oncologiche», ha concluso.
Non solo batteri killer e antibiotico resistenza: «La disinformazione danneggia il Ssn» Una battaglia, quella sanitaria, che si scontra anche e sempre più spesso con un altro grande nemico che sempre il ministro della Salute ha voluto esplicitare e denunciare: «La diffusione di dati non verificati e la strumentalizzazione propagandistica di casi isolati – ha spiegato il titolare del dicastero della Salute – rappresentano un danno grave per il Servizio Sanitario Nazionale. Per gli operatori sanitari. E per tutti i cittadini italiani». Pertanto, ha quindi aggiunto, «è necessario ribadire con fermezza che, dall’insediamento del Governo Meloni, non è stato effettuato alcun taglio alla sanità pubblica . Al contrario, stiamo portando avanti un intenso lavoro di riforma per rafforzare un settore che ha subito anni di depauperamento . La continua diffusione di dati inattendibili e la generalizzazione di casi singoli, sia riguardo alle liste d’attesa che agli scioperi o ai fondi, non fa altro che alimentare una narrazione distorta della realtà »
«Dati inattendibili e la generalizzazione su liste d’attesa, scioperi o fondi, alimentano una narrazione distorta della realtà» Il ministro poi sottolinea come «siamo consapevoli che riformare un settore così complesso richieda tempo e dedizione, ma i primi risultati del nostro lavoro sono già visibili. Abbiamo invertito la tendenza negativa degli anni precedenti e stiamo procedendo con determinazione verso il miglioramento del sistema. In questo percorso – ha così concluso Schillaci – chiediamo la collaborazione costruttiva delle organizzazioni sindacali per vigilare nei casi di troppe e inaccettabili scorrettezze nelle strutture sanitarie che ci raccontano purtroppo quotidianamente i media. Solo attraverso un dialogo basato su dati oggettivi e una cooperazione finalizzata al bene comune possiamo garantire un servizio sanitario sempre più efficiente e vicino ai cittadini ».

author: Tanya Vásquez
title: 368 llantas y 194 bolsas de basura fueron recolectadas por el patronato Kino Limpio y Seguro
text:
368 llantas y 194 bolsas de basura fueron recolectadas por el patronato Kino Limpio y Seguro
Más de 55 personas integrantes del patronato, trabajadores, sociedad civil y algunas empresas participaron en esta jornada
HERMOSILLO, Son.- Un total de 368 llantas y 194 bolsas de basura se recolectaron en la mega limpieza de la carretera a Bahía de Kino organizada por el patronato Kino Limpio y Seguro.
Más de 55 personas integrantes del patronato, trabajadores, sociedad civil y algunas empresas participaron en esta jornada que inició desde las 07:30 horas en el kilómetro 27 de la carretera 100.
Alain Ballesteros, quien es parte del Patronato, expresó que organizaron esta actividad para hacer un llamado a turistas, habitantes y a las autoridades, a que mantengan limpia esta carretera, pues han encontrado un problema de basura a los costados de la carretera.
“La carretera está muy contaminada, basura, muchas llantas, refrigeradores, muebles, escombro, que se convierte en obstáculos importantes en la carretera, es un llamado a concientización al usuarios, turistas, que no tiren la basura, que la lleven al lugar y destino adecuado”, dijo.
En un tramo de dos kilómetros a pie, por ambos lados de la carretera se recolectaron cerca de 180 bolsas jumbo de basura con un peso promedio de 15 a 30 kilos, mientras que en un tramo de seis kilómetros fueron recolectadas 349 llantas.
Además de las llantas, se encontraron entre los principales desechos basura plástica y artículos como tazas de baño, sofás, muebles, carriolas y otros más.
Te puede interesar:
Mantiene Policía Preventiva operativo para evitar arrojen basura
Gabriel Urquidez, del Patronato de Kino limpio y seguro, mencionó que además del llamado de concientización a los ciudadanos, es importante que también las autoridades realicen labores de mantenimiento en las carreteras.
“La limpieza es con el afán de que la sociedad civil, el gobierno del estado, voltee a ver las carreteras no solamente en pintura, baches, sino en lo que impacta en cuanto a suciedad, recolección de desechos, llantas”, indicó.
Servicios públicos municipales y la Patrulla Verde fueron los encargados de trasladar el total de los desechos recolectados.
- 368 llantas en seis kilómetros en vehículo
- 194 bolsas jumbo de basura en dos kilómetros a pie
- Cerca de 55 personas participaron
- Cinco horas de trabajo

elpais.com

publicado:

El gobernador de California, Gavin Newsom, ha decretado este miércoles el estado de emergencia después de que se confirmara el caso grave de gripe aviar en un paciente ingresado en un hospital de Luisiana. Es el primer caso con síntomas graves detectado en el país. El Departamento de Agricultura federal estima que en California, el Estado más poblado del país, hay unas 645 cabezas de ganado infectadas con el virus H5N1, detectado desde agosto pasado.
